steps: Open Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Choose a SmartArt Graphic' dialog box, select 'Hierarchy' category.
Choose the desired organizational chart layout and click 'OK'.
A blank organizational chart will be inserted into the document.
Click on each shape in the chart to add names and titles.
To add more shapes, click on the 'Add Shape' button in the SmartArt Tools Design tab.
To remove a shape, select the shape and press the 'Delete' key.
Customize the chart appearance using the options in the SmartArt Tools Design and Format tabs.
